MESSAGE.JP: 今夜…一晩だけで、すべてを終わらせる。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to put an end to this that night.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to put an end to this that night.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、理樹くんと過ごす学園生活のため。
MESSAGE.EN: So that I could spend time together with Riki-kun.
MESSAGE.Translation: So that I could spend time together with Riki-kun.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、もし…
MESSAGE.EN: But, if...
MESSAGE.Translation: But, if...

MESSAGE.JP: 失敗したら…
MESSAGE.EN: I fail...
MESSAGE.Translation: I fail...

MESSAGE.JP: あたしには、もう授業を受けるという体裁をとる必要もなくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't have to pretend to go to class anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't have to pretend to go to class anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹くんを待つだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was just waiting for Riki-kun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was just waiting for Riki-kun.

MESSAGE.JP: 昼休みはこれまで通り、銃の訓練にあてる。
MESSAGE.EN: During lunch break, we practiced shooting like usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: During lunch break, we practiced shooting like usual.

MESSAGE.JP: そこからが戦いの始まりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The battles were going to start soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: The battles were going to start soon.

MESSAGE.JP: 今は、ただ待つだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: All there was left to do was wait.
MESSAGE.Translation: All there was left to do was wait.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹くんがやってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki-kun finally came.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki-kun finally came.

MESSAGE.JP: あたしは気配を消し、後ろから近づく。
MESSAGE.EN: I hid my presence and approached him from behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hid my presence and approached him from behind.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、銃口を背中に当てる冗談。
MESSAGE.EN: And then I pulled the prank of pointing the gun at his back.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then I pulled the prank of pointing the gun at his back.

MESSAGE.JP: ずっと繰り返してきたけど、今だけは。
MESSAGE.EN: At least, that's what I had done every time so far, but now something was different.
MESSAGE.Translation: At least, that's what I had done every time so far, but now something was different.

MESSAGE.JP: あたしはその背中に抱きついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I pressed myself against his back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pressed myself against his back.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Woah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Woah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「や、闇の執行部めっ、放せっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝C-curse you, Darkness Executives! Let go of me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝C-curse you, Darkness Executives! Let go of me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: この温もりは…本物だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt the warmth of his body... It was real.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt the warmth of his body... It was real.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「…あなたねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝...You.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝...You.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その温もりを放す。
MESSAGE.EN: I let go of that warmth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let go of that warmth.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだ、朱鷺戸さんか、驚いたよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, it's you, Tokido-san? You scared the life out of me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, it's you, Tokido-san? You scared the life out of me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「なんだ、じゃないわよ。今のあたしがほんとに闇の執行部だったらどうすんのよ。放せっ、なんて言っても放してくれないわよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝What's with that reaction? What if it was a real Darkness Executive just now? You think they will let you go if you ask them to?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What's with that reaction? What if it was a real Darkness Executive just now? You think they will let you go if you ask them to?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは、そうだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're right, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're right, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「なってないわねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You're no good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You're no good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それで、その、用事は何？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well then, what did you want to see me for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well then, what did you want to see me for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって朝、僕に裏庭で待つって手紙を…あれ？　違うの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This morning, there was a letter to me saying to wait at the backyard... Huh? Am I wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This morning, there was a letter to me saying to wait at the backyard... Huh? Am I wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「だから、言ってるでしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Are you even listening to me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Are you even listening to me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹くんの頭をぽかっと叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: I hit Riki-kun on the head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hit Riki-kun on the head.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いたぁっ。いきなり何なの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ow, what was that for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ow, what was that for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「敵の罠だったらどうするの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝What if that was an enemy trap?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What if that was an enemy trap?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えぇー…呼び出しておいてそんなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But it was you who called me out...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But it was you who called me out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「日々訓練よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's daily training.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's daily training.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「それとも、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Or do you mean that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Or do you mean that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「闇の執行部に襲われたいの、あなたは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You want to be attacked?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You want to be attacked?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そういうわけじゃないけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「じゃ気をつけなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Then be more careful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Then be more careful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ほいほい呼び出されないこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Don't go somewhere just because someone asked you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Don't go somewhere just because someone asked you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「呼び出し場所では注意すること」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Don't let your guard down once you arrive at the rendezvous point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Don't let your guard down once you arrive at the rendezvous point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「相手にそれを確認する真似はしないこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Confirm that it's not an imposter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Confirm that it's not an imposter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y-yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y-yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「覚えておいて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Remember that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Remember that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 話が終わってしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Our conversation was over...
MESSAGE.Translation: Our conversation was over...

MESSAGE.JP: これ以上何も続かない…。
MESSAGE.EN: There was nothing else to say...
MESSAGE.Translation: There was nothing else to say...

MESSAGE.JP: そりゃそうだ…。昨日会ったばかりだもの。
MESSAGE.EN: That was no surprise... We only met yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was no surprise... We only met yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、あたしは…理樹くんのことを知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: But I knew Riki-kun...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I knew Riki-kun...

MESSAGE.JP: 知っているのに…
MESSAGE.EN: I knew him...
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew him...

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「なに？　どうかした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝What? Something wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What? Something wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: このへんな間をそう訊くしかできない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't think of another way to phrase this strange question.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't think of another way to phrase this strange question.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、それだけなのかな、と思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, no, I was wondering if that was all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, no, I was wondering if that was all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Right...
MESSAGE.Translation: Right...

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「…そうね、それだけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Right. That's all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Right. That's all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「じゃ…あなたからは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Well... what about you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well... what about you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ひとつ訊きたいことがあったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I have one thing I wanted to ask you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I have one thing I wanted to ask you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕たち、いつか会ったことない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Have we met somewhere before?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Have we met somewhere before?❞

MESSAGE.JP: あたしは涙を堪えるのに必死だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was desperate to keep my tears back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was desperate to keep my tears back.

MESSAGE.JP: 何も言葉にならなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't bring myself to say anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't bring myself to say anything.

MESSAGE.JP: さぁ、と手を広げてみせて…
MESSAGE.EN: I just shrugged in response...
MESSAGE.Translation: I just shrugged in response...

MESSAGE.JP: それを確認した理樹くんが、校舎に戻っていくのを見守るだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: And watched Riki-kun go back to the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: And watched Riki-kun go back to the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: あたしは体育倉庫から、グラウンドに立てることができるフラッグを二本持ち出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I took two flags from the gym storehouse, and brought them to the grounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took two flags from the gym storehouse, and brought them to the grounds.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹くんとは校舎裏で落ち合う。
MESSAGE.EN: I met up with Riki-kun behind the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: I met up with Riki-kun behind the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの、それ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you doing with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you doing with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あたしだって好きで持ってきたわけじゃないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's not like I'm carrying it around for fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's not like I'm carrying it around for fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ついてきて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Follow me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Follow me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: フェンスを越え、鬱蒼とした裏山の中に入っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: We jumped the fence and headed into the mountain area behind the school.
MESSAGE.Translation: We jumped the fence and headed into the mountain area behind the school.

MESSAGE.JP: 唯一作れたイレギュラーな隠れ家。
MESSAGE.EN: The only safehouse I was able to create.
MESSAGE.Translation: The only safehouse I was able to create.

MESSAGE.JP: 見え見えなのだろうけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Though it was hidden in plain sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though it was hidden in plain sight.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ここよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼は不安げに辺りを見回している。
MESSAGE.EN: He looked around the area uneasily.
MESSAGE.Translation: He looked around the area uneasily.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「対策を考えたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I've come up with a strategy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I've come up with a strategy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いながら、あたしはフラッグを地面に突き立てる。
MESSAGE.EN: I planted the flags into the ground as I spoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: I planted the flags into the ground as I spoke.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「地下に降り立ったと同時に、ふたりで射撃をし、一瞬にして殲滅する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝If we go down there and both attack at the same time, we can wipe them out in an instant.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝If we go down there and both attack at the same time, we can wipe them out in an instant.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうやって？　僕に正確な射撃を求められても困るんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How? I don't know how things will turn out if you are counting on my shooting to be accurate...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How? I don't know how things will turn out if you are counting on my shooting to be accurate...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あなたは、ただ一直線に薙ぐだけでいいのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's fine, you just need to mow down everything in a straight line.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's fine, you just need to mow down everything in a straight line.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なぐ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mow down?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mow down?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼の元まで戻り、銃を抜く。
MESSAGE.EN: I returned to him, and took out my gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I returned to him, and took out my gun.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「まあ、持ちなさいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Well, take this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well, take this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「降りた梯子を背にあなたは立つ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You will stand with your back to the ladder you descended.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You will stand with your back to the ladder you descended.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「両手でグリップを持って梯子と垂直に銃を突き出す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Hold the gun with both hands and point it away from the ladder.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Hold the gun with both hands and point it away from the ladder.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹くんが言われた通りに、構える。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki-kun does as he is instructed, and held up the gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki-kun does as he is instructed, and held up the gun.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「梯子と垂直であれば片足を前に出してもいいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝If you shoot perpendicular to the ladder, you can put one foot forward.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝If you shoot perpendicular to the ladder, you can put one foot forward.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「それがあなたの基本フォーム。いいわね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝That's your basic stance. Got it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝That's your basic stance. Got it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: うん、と頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: He nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: He nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あたしがスタートって言ったら、その高さを維持したまま、旗から旗まで横一直線に薙ぐ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝When I say ❛start,❜ keep your gun level and shoot in a straight line from one flag to the other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝When I say ❛start,❜ keep your gun level and shoot in a straight line from one flag to the other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「弾が続く限り、往復させて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝As long as you have ammo, keep shooting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝As long as you have ammo, keep shooting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「本番ではこの旗なしに同じ動作を行う、ということ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And when we're doing this for real, I won't have flags to guide me, will I?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And when we're doing this for real, I won't have flags to guide me, will I?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「そうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、敵を狙って撃ったほうが効率的なんじゃないのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But isn't it more effective to aim at the enemy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But isn't it more effective to aim at the enemy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「暗闇の中では理樹くん、敵が見えないでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, you cannot see in the dark, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, you cannot see in the dark, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ、明かりなしで撃つの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, I'm going to shoot without light!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, I'm going to shoot without light!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ええ。何か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Right. What about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Right. What about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいやいや、あたりっこないし、それはきみも同じでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, no, there's no way I'd hit the target. And I don't think you can either, no?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no, there's no way I'd hit the target. And I don't think you can either, no?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうか。まだ説明していなかったか。
MESSAGE.EN: I see. I hadn't explained yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I see. I hadn't explained yet.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「言ってなかったっけ？　あたしは奴らが暗闇でも見える。だから出し抜けるって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Didn't I tell you? I can see them in the darkness. That's why we have the upper hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Didn't I tell you? I can see them in the darkness. That's why we have the upper hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「月明かりがなくても？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even without moonlight?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even without moonlight?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「見えるっていうか、感じるのよ。なんていうか…コウモリやイルカみたいに超音波？　そういう器官があたしには植え付けられてるみたいなの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Not so much see as feel. How to put it... You know how bats and dolphins use ultrasonic waves? It's like I have that kind of sensory organ implanted in me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Not so much see as feel. How to put it... You know how bats and dolphins use ultrasonic waves? It's like I have that kind of sensory organ implanted in me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「だから、真っ暗闇でも敵の位置がわかるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝So I know the enemy's position even in the darkness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝So I know the enemy's position even in the darkness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういうことだったのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I didn't know that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I didn't know that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、本番では真っ暗闇の中で、この旗の位置を思い出して、同じ動作を行う、ということ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, when I'm in darkness, I'll visualize the position of the flags and do as I practiced, is that what you're saying?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, when I'm in darkness, I'll visualize the position of the flags and do as I practiced, is that what you're saying?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「往復させるだけじゃないわ。合わせて、撃つ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝There's more to it than just that. You're going to work with me and shoot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝There's more to it than just that. You're going to work with me and shoot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「撃てば、反動が返ってくるから、再び旗の高さに合わせるのは相当集中力がいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝When you shoot, there will be recoil, so you'll have to focus bringing the gun back to the same level.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝When you shoot, there will be recoil, so you'll have to focus bringing the gun back to the same level.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「精神面の勝負。あなたには向いてる作戦だと思わない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's a mental battle. Don't you think it's the perfect plan for you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's a mental battle. Don't you think it's the perfect plan for you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、一直線だけで敵全員を倒せるわけじゃないよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, I can't defeat all enemies by just shooting in a straight line, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, I can't defeat all enemies by just shooting in a straight line, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「それはあたしがやるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I'll handle everyone else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I'll handle everyone else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言って、二丁の拳銃を抜く。
MESSAGE.EN: I drew my two guns.
MESSAGE.Translation: I drew my two guns.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわ、どっから出したのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow, where did you get those from?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow, where did you get those from?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「そんなことどうでもいいから、特訓よ、特訓っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝That doesn't matter. Get back to training.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝That doesn't matter. Get back to training.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 夜になった。
MESSAGE.EN: Evening came.
MESSAGE.Translation: Evening came.

MESSAGE.JP: あたしたちは、校舎に忍び込んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: We snuck into the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: We snuck into the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「机や椅子に触らないでね…そっとよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Don't touch the chairs or tables... slowly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Don't touch the chairs or tables... slowly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりで『扉』のある教室に忍び込む。
MESSAGE.EN: We snuck into the room with the ❛door.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: We snuck into the room with the ❛door.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 黒板を動かして、扉を開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I moved the blackboard and opened the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I moved the blackboard and opened the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ついてきて。ほんとに真っ暗だから気を付けて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Follow me. It's really pitch black, so be careful❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Follow me. It's really pitch black, so be careful❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ストップ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Stop.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Stop.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 梯子の上まで辿りついた。
MESSAGE.EN: We arrive at the top of the ladder.
MESSAGE.Translation: We arrive at the top of the ladder.

MESSAGE.JP: また夜が訪れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked into the darkness again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked into the darkness again.

MESSAGE.JP: 戦いが始まる。
MESSAGE.EN: The battle had begun.
MESSAGE.Translation: The battle had begun.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あたしが先に降りる。あなたもそれに続いて、すぐ射撃の準備を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I'll go down first. Follow me, and be ready to fire.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I'll go down first. Follow me, and be ready to fire.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「梯子は使わない。飛び降りて。闇の中だから恐いと思うけど、２メートルと６０センチぐらい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Don't use the ladder. Jump down. It may seem scary in the dark, but it's only a 2.6 meter drop .❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Don't use the ladder. Jump down. It may seem scary in the dark, but it's only a 2.6 meter drop .❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 不安げな声。でもやってもらわないと、勝ち目はない。
MESSAGE.EN: He sounded worried, but I need his help or else I don't stand a chance.
MESSAGE.Translation: He sounded worried, but I need his help or else I don't stand a chance.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ＧＯ！で飛び降りるわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝We're gonna jump down when I say ❛GO!❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝We're gonna jump down when I say ❛GO!❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゲームスタートなんて二度と口にするもんか。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd never say ❛game start❜ again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd never say ❛game start❜ again.

MESSAGE.JP: これは戦いだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This was a battle.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was a battle.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「レディ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Ready...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Ready...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ゴゥッ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Go!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Go!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「敵殲滅」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝The enemy's been annihilated.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝The enemy's been annihilated.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「オーケーよ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's okay now, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's okay now, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ライトを取り出して、部屋を照らし出してみせる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took out the light, and waved it around the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took out the light, and waved it around the room.

MESSAGE.JP: もう何者も存在しない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no one left.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no one left.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Phew...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Phew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ようやく緊張が解けたのか、そう深く息をついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I finally relaxed and took a deep breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: I finally relaxed and took a deep breath.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんとかなったね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It worked out somehow...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It worked out somehow...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ちなみにこんなのほんの前哨戦だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝By the way, this is nothing compared to the battles ahead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝By the way, this is nothing compared to the battles ahead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeeh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeeh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「さて、急ぐわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Then, let's hurry up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Then, let's hurry up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 地下８階の気の遠くなるようなフロア表示のついたエレベーター前、そこで奴は待っているのだろうから。
MESSAGE.EN: Since he was waiting there, deep down on the eighth floor, in front of the elevator with the floor sign.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since he was waiting there, deep down on the eighth floor, in front of the elevator with the floor sign.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ありゃ、連中がいない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Ah, they are not here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Ah, they are not here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「連中？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「闇の執行部よ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝The Darkness Executives...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝The Darkness Executives...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、そうだね。いないほうがいいんだよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I see. It's better that way, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I see. It's better that way, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「もちろんよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Of course.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Of course.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「よし、いないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Alright, nobody here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Alright, nobody here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「闇の執行部？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Darkness Executives?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Darkness Executives?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「うん。一度殲滅したら、消えてくれるのよ。光が射したわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Yeah. If we beat them once, they disappear. I'll use the light now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yeah. If we beat them once, they disappear. I'll use the light now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よくわからないけど、よかったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't really get it, but I'm glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't really get it, but I'm glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: でも、こうして希望の光をちらつかせるところも、奴の計算のようでむかつくけど。
MESSAGE.EN: It was vexing that giving me a false sense of hope was also part of their plan.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was vexing that giving me a false sense of hope was also part of their plan.

MESSAGE.JP: ここに階下へと降りる仕掛けがあるはず。
MESSAGE.EN: There should be a way to get to the floor below here.
MESSAGE.Translation: There should be a way to get to the floor below here.

MESSAGE.JP: 先に部屋に踏みいって、『違う』と感じた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stepped into the room first and felt something was off.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stepped into the room first and felt something was off.

MESSAGE.JP: こっちはどうだ…
MESSAGE.EN: How about here...
MESSAGE.Translation: How about here...

MESSAGE.JP: いやっ！
MESSAGE.EN: No!
MESSAGE.Translation: No!

MESSAGE.JP: あたしは理樹くんを突き飛ばした。直後、石の扉が落ちてきて、あたしは閉じこめられることに。
MESSAGE.EN: I shoved Riki-kun aside. The next moment the stone door closed, shutting me inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shoved Riki-kun aside. The next moment the stone door closed, shutting me inside.

MESSAGE.JP: 嗅いだこともない匂いが鼻をついた。
MESSAGE.EN: A smell I didn't recognize assailed my nose.
MESSAGE.Translation: A smell I didn't recognize assailed my nose.

MESSAGE.JP: あたしが置いていたものは、単なる線香だ。
MESSAGE.EN: What I'd left here was ordinary incense.
MESSAGE.Translation: What I'd left here was ordinary incense.

MESSAGE.JP: こいつはなんだ？　異臭としか呼べない…
MESSAGE.EN: But this smell was repulsive...
MESSAGE.Translation: But this smell was repulsive...

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、体が痺れて…
MESSAGE.EN: My body was paralyzed...
MESSAGE.Translation: My body was paralyzed...

MESSAGE.JP: あたしは理樹くんを突き飛ばした。直後、石の扉が落ちてきて、あたしは閉じこめられることに。
MESSAGE.EN: I shoved Riki-kun aside. The next moment the stone door closed, shutting me inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shoved Riki-kun aside. The next moment the stone door closed, shutting me inside.

MESSAGE.JP: …ありゃ？　ここってトラップってわかってたんじゃなかったっけ？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Huh?　Didn't I know there was a trap here?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Huh?　Didn't I know there was a trap here?

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「うおおおぉぉーー！　わかってるのに飛び込んじゃったあぁぁぁーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Uooooo―――! I flew into it even though I knew iiiiit!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Uooooo―――! I flew into it even though I knew iiiiit!❞

MESSAGE.JP: あたしは理樹くんを突き飛ばした。直後、石の扉が落ちてきて、あたしは閉じこめられることに。
MESSAGE.EN: I shoved Riki-kun aside. The next moment the stone door closed, shutting me inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shoved Riki-kun aside. The next moment the stone door closed, shutting me inside.

MESSAGE.JP: そうそう。あたし最近毒ガスにはまってんのよね～。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh yeah, toxic gases were the best～.
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh yeah, toxic gases were the best～.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「って、はまるかよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Like hell they are!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Like hell they are!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ライトを点けて、天井を照らしてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned on the light and shine it at the ceiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned on the light and shine it at the ceiling.

MESSAGE.JP: 当然のように、ロープが三本垂れ下がっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, there were three ropes hanging from the ceiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, there were three ropes hanging from the ceiling.

MESSAGE.JP: あたしは三本とも『試した』はずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd had already ❛tested❜ all three of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd had already ❛tested❜ all three of them.

MESSAGE.JP: だが、正解はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But had no success.
MESSAGE.Translation: But had no success.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「バグってるんじゃないでしょうね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Maybe it's a glitch...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Maybe it's a glitch...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「バグ？　何が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A glitch? What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A glitch? What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「なんでもないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ここは確か、トラップのはず。
MESSAGE.EN: There should have been a trap here.
MESSAGE.Translation: There should have been a trap here.

MESSAGE.JP: 異臭代わりに線香をたいていただけなのだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Instead of that foul odor, there was a burning incense.
MESSAGE.Translation: Instead of that foul odor, there was a burning incense.

MESSAGE.JP: …匂いは一向にしない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But there was no smell.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But there was no smell.

MESSAGE.JP: ライトを点けて、天井を照らしてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned on the light and shine it at the ceiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned on the light and shine it at the ceiling.

MESSAGE.JP: こっちに仕掛けがあった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a contraption.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a contraption.

MESSAGE.JP: ロープが垂れ下がっている。
MESSAGE.EN: A rope was hanging down from there.
MESSAGE.Translation: A rope was hanging down from there.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「さて、ここらに仕掛けがあると思うんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Well, I think there's a contraption over here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well, I think there's a contraption over here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ライトを点けて、天井を照らしてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned on the light and shine it at the ceiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned on the light and shine it at the ceiling.

MESSAGE.JP: あった。
MESSAGE.EN: And there it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: And there it was.

MESSAGE.JP: ロープが垂れ下がっている。
MESSAGE.EN: A rope was hanging down from there.
MESSAGE.Translation: A rope was hanging down from there.

MESSAGE.JP: …三本。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Or actually, three ropes.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Or actually, three ropes.

MESSAGE.JP: 間違えたら、即死。
MESSAGE.EN: If we made the wrong choice, it would be instant death.
MESSAGE.Translation: If we made the wrong choice, it would be instant death.

MESSAGE.JP: 間違いは許されないのだろうな…。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no room for mistakes...
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no room for mistakes...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今度は頭を使う時間だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now is the time to use our heads.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now is the time to use our heads.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あのロープは何を示してるのだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's the purpose behind the ropes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's the purpose behind the ropes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「どれかを引っ張ればいいだけよ、タイミングを合わせてあたしがあなたの肩からジャンプするから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝We have to pull one of them. You'll give me a lift with your shoulders and I'll try to jump at the right moment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝We have to pull one of them. You'll give me a lift with your shoulders and I'll try to jump at the right moment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へぇ…なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahh... I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahh... I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「朱鷺戸さん、さすが頭の回転が早いね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Tokido-san, you really are quick with your head.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Tokido-san, you really are quick with your head.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「朱鷺戸なんて呼ばないで。沙耶でいいから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Don't call me Tokido-san, Saya is fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Don't call me Tokido-san, Saya is fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そんないきなり？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's so sudden.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's so sudden.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「そっちのほうが呼ばれ慣れてるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I'm more comfortable with being called that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I'm more comfortable with being called that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、沙耶さんて呼ぶよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, I'll call you Saya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, I'll call you Saya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「呼び捨てでもいいのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You can drop the honorifics.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You can drop the honorifics.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや、そこまでは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No no, that's too much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No no, that's too much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「さて、話を戻しましょう。問題は、三本のうちのどれが正解か、ということになるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Well, let's get back on topic. The problem now is, which rope is the right one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well, let's get back on topic. The problem now is, which rope is the right one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手がかりはないかと、ふたりして目を凝らし見る。
MESSAGE.EN: We strained our eyes looking around for any clues.
MESSAGE.Translation: We strained our eyes looking around for any clues.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どれを引っ張っても正解かもしれないよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe it's all right to pull on any of them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe it's all right to pull on any of them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「そんな甘い話があったら、あたしみたいな存在は必要とされないのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝If things were that simple, there would be no need for someone like me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝If things were that simple, there would be no need for someone like me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんなスパイの仕事を侮辱するような意味じゃなくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, I didn't mean to insult the spy profession...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, I didn't mean to insult the spy profession...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「わかってるわよ。ただ、すべてが正解なんてことはありえない。間違いは存在するのよ。高い確率で」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I know that. However, it's impossible for all of them to be correct. It's highly likely at least one is the wrong choice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I know that. However, it's impossible for all of them to be correct. It's highly likely at least one is the wrong choice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あたしが作った仕掛けは、真ん中の位置だった。だから、真ん中はないか…？
MESSAGE.EN: When I designed this, I set the middle option to be safe, so maybe I shouldn't pick the middle rope...?
MESSAGE.Translation: When I designed this, I set the middle option to be safe, so maybe I shouldn't pick the middle rope...?

MESSAGE.JP: いや、その裏をかいて、真ん中が正解かもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Or maybe I was being misled and the correct answer was still the middle rope?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or maybe I was being misled and the correct answer was still the middle rope?

MESSAGE.JP: 考えて決まるような問題でもないけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't seem like thinking about it would get us anywhere though...
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't seem like thinking about it would get us anywhere though...

MESSAGE.JP: つーか、後はひとつしか残ってないじゃないか。なんて運の悪さよ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, there was only one option left. Such misfortune...
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, there was only one option left. Such misfortune...

MESSAGE.JP: つーか、全部間違いだったじゃないか！
MESSAGE.EN: Hey, weren't all of them wrong!
MESSAGE.Translation: Hey, weren't all of them wrong!

MESSAGE.JP: いこう。
MESSAGE.EN: Let's go.
MESSAGE.Translation: Let's go.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「理樹くんからはなにか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Any ideas?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Any ideas?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんなプロをさしおいて、意見なんてないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, there's nothing I can suggest to a pro like you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, there's nothing I can suggest to a pro like you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あたしこういう謎解きは弱いから、安心して意見して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I'm bad at solving puzzles like these, so don't worry. I want to hear what you think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I'm bad at solving puzzles like these, so don't worry. I want to hear what you think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謎解きって、解くような謎があるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Solving puzzles? You mean there's a puzzle to be solved?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Solving puzzles? You mean there's a puzzle to be solved?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「わからないわ。それも含めて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I don't know. Tell me what you think, that included.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I don't know. Tell me what you think, that included.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなぁ、僕が意見するなんて釈迦に説法だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No way, my opinion wouldn't have any value...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No way, my opinion wouldn't have any value...❞

MESSAGE.JP: どんな意見も言ってくれなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: He wouldn't tell me.
MESSAGE.Translation: He wouldn't tell me.

MESSAGE.JP: 跳んで引っ張る以外なさそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My only choice was to pull one of the ropes now.
MESSAGE.Translation: My only choice was to pull one of the ropes now.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「理樹くん、下お願い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, please get down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, please get down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その肩にあたしは足をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood on his shoulders.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood on his shoulders.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いくよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ready?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ready?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「うんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さあ、どのロープを引っ張る？
MESSAGE.EN: Well, which rope will I pull?
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, which rope will I pull?

MESSAGE.JP: 体が持ち上がる。同時にあたしは理樹くんの肩を蹴って跳んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He straightened his body. At the same time, I kicked off Riki-kun's shoulders and jumped.
MESSAGE.Translation: He straightened his body. At the same time, I kicked off Riki-kun's shoulders and jumped.

MESSAGE.JP: 右手でしっかりロープを捕まえ、そのまま体重をかけて引っ張る。
MESSAGE.EN: I grabbed hold of the rope with my right hand, and pulled on it with the weight of my body.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grabbed hold of the rope with my right hand, and pulled on it with the weight of my body.

MESSAGE.JP: びゅん。
MESSAGE.EN: Twitch.
MESSAGE.Translation: Twitch.

MESSAGE.JP: ざくり。
MESSAGE.EN: Thunk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thunk.

MESSAGE.JP: 考える間もなくあたしは死んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was dead before I had time to even think.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was dead before I had time to even think.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ロープを引っ張ればいいのよ。タイミングを合わせてあたしがあなたの肩からジャンプするから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's fine to just pull the rope. You'll give me a boost with your shoulders and I'll try to jump at the right time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's fine to just pull the rope. You'll give me a boost with your shoulders and I'll try to jump at the right time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あと沙耶さんと呼びなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝And call me Saya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝And call me Saya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そんないきなりふたつのこと同時に言われても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's too much all at once...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's too much all at once...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「さて、問題は、三本のうちのどれか、ということになるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Well, the problem is which one we should choose out of three of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well, the problem is which one we should choose out of three of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いこう。
MESSAGE.EN: Let's go.
MESSAGE.Translation: Let's go.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「理樹くんからはなにか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Any ideas?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Any ideas?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんなプロをさしおいて、意見なんてないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, there's nothing I can suggest to a pro like you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, there's nothing I can suggest to a pro like you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「もう、とことんミスしてるから、安心して意見して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I make mistakes all the time, so don't worry, I want to hear your thoughts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I make mistakes all the time, so don't worry, I want to hear your thoughts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ミス？　いつ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mistakes? Like what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mistakes? Like what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「いいから、とっとと、なんか言いなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Forget it, just tell me what you think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Forget it, just tell me what you think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、もしかしたら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uhm, it could be that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uhm, it could be that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「もしかしたら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It could be that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It could be that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「三本とも引くのが正解かもしれないよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The answer is to pull each of them in turn?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The answer is to pull each of them in turn?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「もし、三本とも引いて駄目だった場合は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝What if pulling each of them is not the answer?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What if pulling each of them is not the answer?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなったら他の引っ張り方を考える必要があるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then we need to think of another way to pull the ropes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then we need to think of another way to pull the ropes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「考えて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Think of something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Think of something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、いま？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, right now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, right now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「そう。今。三本とも引っ張って、全部失敗に終わってると仮定して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Right now. What if I pulled all three of them and it didn't work?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Right now. What if I pulled all three of them and it didn't work?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、同時に引くとか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then pull all of them at the same time...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then pull all of them at the same time...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「なるほど。いいじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I see. Sounds good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I see. Sounds good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、この解き方には問題がひとつだけある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Except there's one problem with this idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Except there's one problem with this idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「三本同時に引くためには、手が足りない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝To pull three ropes at the same time, you don't have enough hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝To pull three ropes at the same time, you don't have enough hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「そりゃ正解だわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝That must be it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝That must be it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もうそれ以外に正解が考えられないぐらい意地が悪い。
MESSAGE.EN: It was so wicked it had to be the answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was so wicked it had to be the answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 何もしなくても地下への扉が開くぐらいに意地が悪い。
MESSAGE.EN: This was in the same vein as leaving the door to the maze open from the beginning.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was in the same vein as leaving the door to the maze open from the beginning.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえず、左右同時とか、できそうなのから試してみるってのはどう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝First off, how about trying to pull the right and left one at the same time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝First off, how about trying to pull the right and left one at the same time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: どう？って、そんなお気軽にあたしの命を賭けないでほしいわね…。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Try❜? I wish you wouldn't risk my life so carelessly...
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Try❜? I wish you wouldn't risk my life so carelessly...

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「三本同時よ。いくわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝We'll get all three of them. Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝We'll get all three of them. Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「真ん中は口を使って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I'll use my mouth for the one in the middle...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I'll use my mouth for the one in the middle...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ヒロインにあるまじき行為だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This wasn't very heroine-like.
MESSAGE.Translation: This wasn't very heroine-like.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええぇ、ほんとに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you serious?!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you serious?!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ほら、主人公が引いてるし…。
MESSAGE.EN: No wonder the protagonist was shocked...
MESSAGE.Translation: No wonder the protagonist was shocked...

MESSAGE.JP: ほんと、とことん意地が悪い。
MESSAGE.EN: Really, it was all so wicked.
MESSAGE.Translation: Really, it was all so wicked.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やめておいたほうがいいと思うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think you should do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think you should do that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あたしにはわかるのよ。三本同時に引っ張るのが正解。それ以外は間違いでくびちょんぱになるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I know that the correct answer is to pull all three ropes together. If we don't, it's gonna send my head flying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I know that the correct answer is to pull all three ropes together. If we don't, it's gonna send my head flying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「くびちょんぱって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your head?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your head?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ようは死ぬってこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It means I'm gonna die.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It means I'm gonna die.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、口なんて届くのかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But can you reach it with your mouth?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But can you reach it with your mouth?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あんたが届けるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You can make it happen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You can make it happen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも力入れすぎたら、天井で頭ぶつよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But if I overdo it, you will crash into the ceiling...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But if I overdo it, you will crash into the ceiling...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「それぐらいでいいわよ、おもいきり飛ばして頂戴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝That's nothing, just send me flying with all your might.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝That's nothing, just send me flying with all your might.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もう首を切られるよりは、なんでもマシよ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Anything was better than having my head cut off...
MESSAGE.Translation: Anything was better than having my head cut off...

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「理樹くん、下お願い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, please get down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, please get down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その肩にあたしは足をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood on his shoulders.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood on his shoulders.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いくよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ready?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ready?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「うんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 跳んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I jumped.
MESSAGE.Translation: I jumped.

MESSAGE.JP: 右手。
MESSAGE.EN: Right hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 左手。
MESSAGE.EN: Left hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Left hand.

MESSAGE.JP: そして口！
MESSAGE.EN: And then mouth!
MESSAGE.Translation: And then mouth!

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を傾け、必死に文字通り、食らいついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I tilted my head and literally sunk my teeth into the rope.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tilted my head and literally sunk my teeth into the rope.

MESSAGE.JP: いけぇ！　がぶり！
MESSAGE.EN: Go! Grab it!
MESSAGE.Translation: Go! Grab it!

MESSAGE.JP: がくん！
MESSAGE.EN: Thunk!
MESSAGE.Translation: Thunk!

MESSAGE.JP: 三本同時に体重をかけて、引っ張った。
MESSAGE.EN: Using my body weight, I pulled on all ropes at the same time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Using my body weight, I pulled on all ropes at the same time.

MESSAGE.JP: ごとり、と鳴った気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard a clunk.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard a clunk.

MESSAGE.JP: 着地したあたしは生きている。
MESSAGE.EN: I landed, still alive.
MESSAGE.Translation: I landed, still alive.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ぃよっっっしゃああぁぁぁぁーーっ!!　みたか、このくそやろおぉぉぉーーっっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Hell yeah! Did ya see that? You damn asshole!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Hell yeah! Did ya see that? You damn asshole!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹くんが引いている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki-kun looked grossed out...
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki-kun looked grossed out...

MESSAGE.JP: 思わず地が出てしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: I accidentally revealed my true self...
MESSAGE.Translation: I accidentally revealed my true self...

MESSAGE.JP: まあこの先なりふりなんて構ってられないのだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, I couldn't worry about putting up a facade anymore...
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, I couldn't worry about putting up a facade anymore...

MESSAGE.JP: こんなあたしでも、理樹くんは好きになってくれるのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Would Riki-kun still fall in love with me like this...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Would Riki-kun still fall in love with me like this...?

MESSAGE.JP: すっごく心配だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was really worried...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was really worried...
